column2: Standard set of easy to use animations and declarative transitions for React Native

column5:
Fix typing of AnimatableProperties.animation (#256)

* Fix typing of AnimatableProperties.animation

* Add custom animation usage examples in Readme

Add custom animation imperative usage (#275)

I failed to find documentation for this, but I found this issue:
https://github.com/oblador/react-native-animatable/issues/174

Support prop-type removal transforms (#233)

react-native-animatable wasn't working in production on projects using transform-react-remove-prop-types because the prop-types were getting removed and the Object.keys was being called with undefined.

Allow percentage animations for non-interpolated values like width and margins. (#234)

Because some values are not regarded as interpolated values (such as width), using a generic transition with percentage values causes an error. This pr allows those values to be interpolated if their value is a non-number (i.e. a string percentage).

Make animation types available for import (#228)

* feat: make animation types available for import

* feat: include CustomAnimation in exported type

Update transition typing to ReadonlyArray (#207)

We never make any modifications to the array so there is no need for it to be an `Array`
Remove misleading info about ios setup for useNativeDriver (#211)
Fix bug where old onAnimationEnd handler would be called

Add iterationDelay prop (#169)

* Feature: added iterationPause property

* Fix: addressed PR feedback

* Fix lint errors

* Add default value for iterationDelay prop
Bump jest and fix linting configuration

Add onTransitionBegin and onTransitionEnd props (#187)

* Add transition callbacks

Adds the `onTransitionBegin` and `onTransitionEnd` callbacks
that are invoked when transitions occur. The property that
is transitioning is provided to the callback so that users
can determine which property triggered the transition in
situations where there are multiple transitioning
properties

* Do not capture callbacks

This will make sure that the currently set callbacks on the
element are invoked and **not** the ones that were set when
the transition was created

* Fire `onTransitionBegin` after the correct delay

Fix transition typings (#190)

Allows assigning multiple transition prooperties now. `keyof S[]`
is the keys of an array of the generic property which is `length`,
etc.
Add link to React Europe talk
Update examples in README to use callback refs
Fix code example typo in README (#158)

Fixed typos and errors in TypeScript definition (#153)

* fix(Types): fixed typos & TS errors

* fix(Types): direction was written as 'directin'

Migrate deprecated React.PropTypes (#134)

* migrate deprecated React.PropTypes

* Replace React.PropTypes with 'prop-types'
Cap negative width/height values to 0 to avoid yoga layout bug #122
Bump test/lint tools/style guides and fix new warnings
Fix native animation driver support for swing, tada and wobble

Implement delay for transitions (#108)

* use delay for transition

* use nativeDriver prop

* use delay for multiple values

* Make all transitions with `delay` use `timing`
Improve support for inline animation declarations
Fall back to generic margins and paddings for transitions. Fixes #103
Fix bug where regular animations would not create interaction handle

Add `tintColor` to inpterpolation style properties (#105)

I've tested this locally and this appears to work.

A great use-case for this is TabBar or NavBar with icons that need to animate to different colors.

Let me know if there are any issues.
Make transition() & transitionTo() respect useNativeDriver prop (#106)
Expand built in easing functions with penner equations #77
Add support for custom easing functions #77
Fix easing on animations via prop #78

Merge pull request #67 from oblador/custom-animations

RFC: Custom and native animations
Add section about custom animations to README
Make animations natively driven in example project
Expose animation shorthand methods for backwards compatibility
Fix lint errors and unbreak example
Make easing functions and defaults mirror the web
Refactor createAnimatableComponent to support custom animations
Update example to use RN 0.36.1 and a ListView

Merge pull request #60 from faceyspacey/patch-1

fix for RNW warnings regarding unsupported prop types
fix for RNW warnings regarding unsupported prop types

Merge pull request #51 from eronisko/broken_example

Fix Android example by adding application android:name in AndroidMainfest
Bumps example project to React Native 0.31.

Merge pull request #29 from miracle2k/react-web

Fix Layout animations on react-web

Fix Layout animations on react-web

On react-web, onLayout runs before componentDidMount().

Merge pull request #21 from aforty/master

Adds rotate animation

Revert "Fixed: warnings with react-native 0.25.x"

This reverts commit 7a082098049ddd331b110b9ced76f22b7cc2f970.

Merge pull request #25 from jndev/patch-1

Fix parameter name in shake() method
Fix parameter name in shake() method
Bumps example to RN 0.25 and refactors to ES2016.

Merge pull request #15 from rpastorelle/master

Pass `callback` to `_startAnimation` when calling recursively.

Merge pull request #17 from bsy/master

add closing >

Pass `callback` to `_startAnimation` when calling recursively.
This is necessary in order for `onAnimationEnd` to be called when `iterationCount` >1
Fixes bug where transitionTo() would throw if not accompanied with a transition prop. Fixes #11

Merge pull request #12 from shauns/master

Change whitespace character

Change whitespace character

To enable Flow type checking
Fall back to window dimensions for layout dependent animations. #5
Breaking change: Never rejects animation promises to avoid red screen for unhandled rejections.
Updates documentation with onAnimationEnd and animation promises.
Updates README to use style instead of transitionValue
Disables controlled value of duration slider for smoother dragging. Fixes #1
Updates README with new transition syntax.
Updates demo to use new style driven transitions.
Implements style driven transitions with support for multiple transitions.
Adds isInteraction: false for looped animations.
Fixed non looping gif in README.
Updated README with direction, easing and iterationCount usage.
Fixed bug where alternate/alternate-reverse directions was switched and easing method too.
Updated demo and readme with non numeric transitions.
Fixes bug where transitionTo would sometimes not respect currentTransitionValue.
Fixed bug with delayed animations that sometimes will fire twice.
Adds support for non numeric transition values.
Fixes bug where setting off a new animation the declarative way didn't work.
Adds demo gifs of all animations.
Support for declarative use of layout dependent animations.
Implements support for setNativeProps for use with Touchable* etc.
Update README with animation types and imperative usage.
Break out direction logic into getAnimationValueForDirection.
Adds flash, jello, pulse, rubberBand, swing, tada, wobble animations.
Adds flipInX, flipInY, flipOutX, flipOutY animations.
